name: Dying Wish
description:
Dying Wish

Roguelite-Game

Four weeks GameJam By Farkas-Antoine Bocz, Patrick Faubert, Marc-André Lajeunesse and Kevin Fournier

Project for LaSalle College

 Crimson Rider's breaks new grounds by bringing you a third-person experience with dynamic combat and jaw-dropping environments. You are in the shoes of an unknown soldier who deals with a mysterious sorcerer to help you defeat many enemies in a Dark Fantasy world. You will experience a mix of  the Dark Souls ambience and the dynamic combat of God Of War (2018). Crimson Rider's studio does not hide from its inspirations and puts them forward.

Note that the Gamepad does not currently work in the menu.
